verses.verse: The burden<WH4853> of Egypt:<WH4714> "Behold,<WH3068> Yahweh rides<WH7392> on a swift<WH7031> cloud,<WH5645> and comes<WH935> to Egypt.<WH4714> The idols<WH457> of Egypt<WH4714> will tremble<WH5128> at his presence;<WH6440> and the heart<WH3824> of Egypt<WH4714> will melt<WH4549> in its midst.<WH7130>

I will stir<WH5526> up the Egyptians<WH4714> against the Egyptians,<WH4714> and they will fight<WH3898> everyone<WH376> against his brother,<WH251> and everyone<WH376> against his neighbor;<WH7453> city<WH5892> against city,<WH5892> and kingdom<WH4467> against kingdom.<WH4467>

The spirit<WH7307> of Egypt<WH4714> will fail<WH1238> in its midst.<WH7130> I will destroy<WH1104> its counsel.<WH6098> They will seek<WH1875> the idols,<WH457> the charmers,<WH328> those who have familiar spirits,<WH178> and the wizards.<WH3049>

I<WH853> will give over<WH5534> the Egyptians<WH4714> into the hand<WH3027> of a cruel<WH7186> lord.<WH113> A fierce<WH5794> king<WH4428> will rule<WH4910> over them,<WH5002>" says the Lord,<WH113> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>
The waters<WH4325> will fail<WH5405> from the sea,<WH3220> and the river<WH5104> will be wasted<WH2717> and become dry.<WH3001>

The rivers<WH5104> will become<WH2186> foul.<WH2186> The streams<WH2975> of Egypt<WH4693> will be diminished<WH1809> and dried up.<WH2717> The reeds<WH7070> and flags<WH5488> will wither away.<WH7060>

The meadows<WH6169> by the Nile,<WH2975> by the brink<WH6310> of the Nile,<WH2975> and all the sown<WH4218> fields of the Nile,<WH2975> will become dry,<WH3001> be driven away,<WH5086> and be no more.

The fishermen<WH1771> will lament,<WH578> and all those who<WH7993> fish<WH2443> in the Nile<WH2975> will mourn,<WH56> and those who spread<WH6566> nets<WH4365> on<WH6440> the waters<WH4325> will languish.<WH535>
Moreover those who work<WH5647> in combed<WH8305> flax,<WH6593> and those who weave<WH707> white cloth,<WH2355> will be confounded.<WH954>
The pillars<WH8356> will be broken<WH1792> in pieces.<WH6213> All those who work for hire<WH7938> will be grieved<WH99> in soul.<WH5315>

The princes<WH8269> of Zoan<WH6814> are utterly foolish.<WH191> The counsel<WH6098> of the wisest<WH2450> counselors<WH3289> of Pharaoh<WH6547> has become stupid.<WH1197> How do you say<WH559> to Pharaoh,<WH6547> "I am the son<WH1121> of the wise,<WH2450> the son<WH1121> of ancient<WH6924> kings?<WH4428>"
Where<WH335> then<WH645> are your wise<WH2450> men?<WH5046> Let them tell you now;<WH3045> and let them know what Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> has purposed<WH3289> concerning Egypt.<WH4714>

The princes<WH8269> of Zoan<WH6814> have become fools.<WH2973> The princes<WH8269> of Memphis<WH5297> are deceived.<WH5377> They have caused Egypt<WH4714> to go astray,<WH8582> who are the cornerstone<WH6438> of her tribes.<WH7626>

Yahweh<WH3068> has mixed<WH4537> a spirit<WH7307> of perverseness<WH5773> in the midst<WH7130> of her;<WH4714> and they have caused Egypt to go astray<WH8582> in all of its works,<WH4639> like a drunken<WH7910> man staggers<WH8582> in his vomit.<WH6892>
Neither shall there be any work<WH4639> for Egypt,<WH4714> which head<WH7218> or tail,<WH2180> palm branch<WH3712> or rush,<WH100> may do.<WH6213>

In that day<WH3117> the Egyptians<WH4714> will be like women.<WH802> They will tremble<WH2729> and fear<WH6342> because<WH6440> of the shaking<WH8573> of the hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> which he shakes over them.<WH5130>

The land<WH127> of Judah<WH3063> will become a terror<WH2283> to Egypt.<WH4714> Everyone to whom mention<WH2142> is made of it will be afraid,<WH6342> because<WH6440> of the plans<WH6098> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> which he determines against it.<WH3289>

In that day,<WH3117> there will be five<WH2568> cities<WH5892> in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> that speak<WH1696> the language<WH8193> of Canaan,<WH3667> and swear<WH7650> to Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635> One<WH259> will be called<WH559> "The city<WH5892> of destruction.<WH2041>"
In that day,<WH3117> there will be an altar<WH4196> to Yahweh<WH3068> in the midst<WH8432> of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> and a pillar<WH4676> to Yahweh<WH3068> at<WH681> its border.<WH1366>

It will be for a sign<WH226> and for a witness<WH5707> to Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> in the land<WH776> of Egypt;<WH4714> for they will cry<WH6817> to Yahweh<WH3068> because<WH6440> of oppressors,<WH3905> and he will send<WH7971> them a savior<WH3467> and a defender,<WH7227> and he will deliver them.<WH5337>

Yahweh<WH3068> will be known<WH3045> to Egypt,<WH4714> and the Egyptians<WH4714> will know<WH3045> Yahweh<WH3068> in that day.<WH3117> Yes,<WH5647> they will worship with sacrifice<WH2077> and offering,<WH4503> and will vow<WH5088> a vow<WH5087> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and will perform it.<WH7999>

Yahweh<WH3068> will strike<WH5062> Egypt,<WH4714> striking<WH5062> and healing.<WH7495> They will return<WH7725> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and he will be entreated<WH6279> by them,<WH7495> and will heal them.

In that day<WH3117> there will be a highway<WH4546> out of Egypt<WH4714> to Assyria,<WH804> and the Assyrian<WH804> shall come<WH935> into Egypt,<WH4714> and the Egyptian<WH4714> into Assyria;<WH804> and the Egyptians<WH4714> will worship<WH5647> with the Assyrians.<WH804>
In that day,<WH3117> Israel<WH3478> will be the third<WH7992> with Egypt<WH4714> and with Assyria,<WH804> a blessing<WH1293> in the midst<WH7130> of the earth;<WH776>

because Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> has blessed<WH1288> them,<WH559> saying, "Blessed<WH1288> be Egypt<WH4714> my people,<WH5971> Assyria<WH804> the work<WH4639> of my hands,<WH3027> and Israel<WH3478> my inheritance.<WH5159>"
